news.title: Supreme Court’s Blow to Emissions Efforts May Imperil Paris Climate Accord
news.description: The Supreme Court’s decision to halt the carrying out of President Obama’s climate change regulation could weaken the international global warming accord reached in Paris climate diplomats say

news.title: EPA accuses VW of cheating on emission rules
news.description: Diesel cars from Volkswagen and Audi cheated on clean air rules by including software that made the cars' emissions look cleaner than they actually were

news.title: Cars, wood-fired pizza ovens restricted as Italy fights pollution
news.description: Rome and Milan have imposed bans on cars, with one small town near Naples prohibiting wood-fired pizza ovens, as Italian authorities seek to combat air-pollution

news.title: Study: Lawn mowing equals car trip
news.description: Spending an hour behind a roaring lawn mower can spew nearly the same amount of oily pollution into the air as a 100-mile car trip

news.title: The dirty truth about clean diesel
news.description: Volkswagen persuaded consumers it had created a new generation of so-called clean diesel cars — until investigators discovered that defeat devices were concealing the fact that its vehicles emitted up to 40 times the permitted levels of pollutants during regular use

news.title: Cars, trucks, and air pollution
news.description: In 2013, transportation contributed more than half of the carbon monoxide and nitrogen oxides, and almost a quarter of the hydrocarbons emitted into our air

news.title: Dirty downside to driverless cars revealed in study
news.description: Driverless cars better be able to refuel themselves. They’ll consume more energy than cars with drivers

news.title: Study: Most car related air pollution comes from only 25% of cars
news.description: A recent study conducted by University of Toronto researchers found that just 25 percent of cars they measured produced about 90 percent of the total traffic-related air pollution

news.title: Germany seeks more e-car usage
news.description: Electric cars are to be used by parliamentarians in Berlin next year in a move billed as part of Germany's switch to climate-friendly mobility

news.title: Are Uber and Lyft helping or hurting the environment?
news.description: Berkeley researchers will get unprecedented access to data from both companies and riders to analyze if on-demand ride services are climate friends or foes
